intro: Batrachium omoiophyllum, commonly known as the smooth batrachium, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its erect, herbaceous stems and alternate, ovate leaves with smooth margins. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink, with five petals. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas and thrives in moist, well-drained soils. Batrachium omoiophyllum is often found in shaded, humid environments such as forests and wetlands.
